short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables auto translation on reddit when clicking google search results with auto-translation enabled (?/tl=countrycode)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever clicked on a google search result from reddit which looked like it's in your local language but it's some auto-translated mess?

This extension stops the automatic translation and instead redirects you to the original reddit post.
